snippet: The new owners of the Los Angeles Dodgers held their first news conference and were not eager to discuss their predecessor, Frank McCourt.
lead_paragraph: The new owners of the Los Angeles Dodgers held their first news conference and were not eager to discuss their predecessor, Frank McCourt.

headline.seo: Frank McCourt, Old Owner of Dodgers, Not a Popular Topic With New Owners
headline.main: Old Owner of Dodgers Not a Popular Topic With New Owners
headline.print_headline: Old Owner of Dodgers Not a Popular Topic With New Owners
